Callback16Header: Speak with Asa back at Camp
Name: A Moment of Peace
Phase0Description:
With the cultists stopped, the Iron Wolves may have a moment of peace.

Haddad and Asa suggested that I speak with Dawood. He's recovering at the medical tent.
Phase14Description: With the cultists stopped, the Iron Wolves may have a moment of peace. I should speak with Asa and Dawood back at camp.
Toast: A moment of peace, but not without cost.
